snippet: Dwight Howard wants to play in a larger market and has demanded a trade from Orlando. The Magic’s owner, Rich DeVos, and the team have not given up hope.
abstract: Orlando Magic have not yet given up hope on retaining star center Dwight Howard, who has asked to be traded so he can play in a larger market.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard wants to play in a larger market and has demanded a trade from Orlando. The Magic’s owner, Rich DeVos, and the team have not given up hope.

headline.seo: Magic Trying to Sell Howard on Staying Put
headline.main: Magic Owner Holds On to Hope and Howard, for Now
headline.print_headline: Magic Has Simple Message for Star Center: Stay
